content: does zulipchat send mail over TLS with explicit or implicit TLS?
im guessing explicit SMTP TLS, it is sending STARTTLS
in some case, the mail server im sending to is doing implicit TLS ( expect TLS to be initiated instead of client sending STARTLS)
@kyrogue is your question for a custom server or Zulip Cloud? For the former, it's configurable.
@kyrogue ok, for that, it depends on your configuration in the EMAIL_ settings variables in /etc/zulip/settings.py.
We use the standard Django system for sending mail, so docs on that may be able to answer your question.
